name: Sherlanders
description:
Story

Sherlanders is about a young girl that likes to fight monsters for fun! She uses her massive mega punch to disturb monsters that were just minding theor own business. SHe has no business being so brave.  Help her defeat the monsters and collect gold coins as you defeat them!

Controls:

WASD: Move

left-click: Punch

Features and capabilities

  • 3D camera
  • Boss Fight
  • Multiple enemy types
  • combat system

Minimum requirements for the game

Minimum requirementsWindowsOperating system version Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11, 64-bit versions only. CPU X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support Graphics API DX10, DX11, and DX12-capable GPUs Additional requirements Hardware vendor officially supported drivers
